title: Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop M2 Pro chip with 12‑core CPU and 19‑core GPU: 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR Display, 16GB Unified Memory, 512GB SSD Storage. Works with iPhone/iPad; Space Gray
descriptions:
Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop — 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR, M2 Pro or M2 Max, Space Gray

Power through pro workflows with Apple’s 2023 MacBook Pro. Choose between the M2 Pro or M2 Max chip, both with a 12‑core CPU for blistering performance in code, design, photo, and video. Pair it with a superb 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display and all‑day battery life to create anywhere.

Key features
- Performance chips: 
  - M2 Pro: 12‑core CPU, 19‑core GPU, up to 32GB unified memory.
  - M2 Max: 12‑core CPU, up to 38‑core GPU, up to 96GB unified memory.
- Memory and storage: 16GB unified memory and 512GB SSD standard; higher configurations available.
- Display: 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR with Extreme Dynamic Range, over 1000 nits brightness, HDR, and pro reference modes.
- Battery life: Up to 22 hours for true all‑day use.
- Camera and audio: 1080p FaceTime HD camera, studio‑quality three‑mic array, six‑speaker sound system with Spatial Audio.
- Ports and connectivity: MagSafe charging; three Thunderbolt 4 ports; SDXC card slot; HDMI; headphone jack; Wi‑Fi 6E; Bluetooth 5.3.
- Keyboard and security: Magic Keyboard with full‑height function row and Touch ID.
- Build: Durable all‑aluminum unibody enclosure in Space Gray.
- Compatibility: Optimized for Adobe Creative Cloud, Xcode, Affinity Designer, Microsoft 365, plus the ability to run iPhone and iPad apps.
- Cross‑device features: Universal Clipboard, Messages, FaceTime calls, and more for a seamless Apple ecosystem experience.
- Software: Free macOS updates to keep performance and security current.

Why it’s great
- Pro power without compromise: Handle 8K video, 3D assets, code builds, and massive photo libraries with ease.
- Best‑in‑class display and sound: Accurate color and cinematic audio for creators and storytellers.
- Real ports, real workflow: Ingest media via SDXC, connect external displays via HDMI/Thunderbolt 4, and top up quickly with MagSafe.
- All‑day mobility: Up to 22 hours of battery life keeps you productive from studio to set.

What’s in the box
- 16‑inch MacBook Pro (2023, Space Gray)
- 140W USB‑C Power Adapter (model may vary by configuration)
- USB‑C to MagSafe 3 Cable

Ideal for
- Creatives using Adobe CC and Affinity apps
- Developers building in Xcode
- Power users managing large datasets or multitasking across pro apps
- Anyone who wants a premium laptop with long battery life and top‑tier display and audio

Configure yours
- Choose M2 Pro or M2 Max
- Increase unified memory up to 96GB (with M2 Max)
- Expand SSD storage to meet your project needs

The 2023 MacBook Pro delivers elite performance, phenomenal battery life, and the ports pros need—all in a sleek, durable, all‑aluminum design with years of free software updates.
